flavor_text_entries.flavor_text:
２本の　尻尾で　木の実の　殻を
器用に　むいて　食べる。本物の
腕は　ほとんど　使わなくなった。

To eat, it deftly shucks nuts with its two tails.
It rarely uses its arms now.

Si nutre di nocciole che sbuccia con le due code.
Raramente usa le sue vere braccia.

Para comer, rompe nueces con sus dos colas. Raras veces
utiliza sus brazos.

Wenn es hungrig ist, knackt es Nüsse mit seinen
beiden Schweifen. Nur selten verwendet es die Arme.

Il se nourrit de noix qu’il épluche avec ses deux queues
habiles. Il utilise de moins en moins ses bras.

2개의 꼬리로 나무열매 껍질을
솜씨 좋게 벗겨 먹는다. 진짜
팔은 거의 쓰지 않게 되었다.

２ほんの　しっぽで　きの の　からを
きように　むいて　たべる。ほんものの
うでは　ほとんど　つかわなくなった。

大勢の　群れで　行動する。
尻尾を　つなぎ合わせて　輪っかを
作る。友情の　印らしい。

They work in large colonies and make rings by
linking their tails, apparently in friendship.

Vivono in colonie numerose e formano anelli legando le loro
code in segno di amicizia.

Habitan en grandes colonias y forman anillos uniendo sus
colas, aparentemente en signo de amistad.

Sie leben in großen Kolonien und verbinden ihre Schweife
in Freundschaft.

Ils vivent en grandes colonies et relient leurs queues
pour former un anneau en signe d’amitié.

많은 무리로 행동한다.
꼬리를 맞잡아 원을 만든다.
우정의 표시인 듯하다.

おおぜいの　むれで　こうどうする。
しっぽを　つなぎあわせて　わっかを
つくる。ゆうじょうの　しるしらしい。

しっぽを　つなぎあわせて　わっかを
つくる。ゆうじょうの　しるしらしい。

Split into two, the tails are so
adept at handling and doing things,
Ambipom rarely uses its hands.

Split into two, the tails are so
adept at handling and doing things,
Ambipom rarely uses its hands.

Split into two, the tails are so
adept at handling and doing things,
Ambipom rarely uses its hands.

Ses queues jumelles sont si agiles
et efficaces qu’il ne se sert que
très rarement de ses bras.

Ses queues jumelles sont si agiles
et efficaces qu’il ne se sert que
très rarement de ses bras.

It is very difficult to dodge the
consecutive strikes of its two tails.

They live on large trees. They are
said to communicate by connecting
their tails to those of others.

adept at handling and doing things,
AMBIPOM rarely uses its hands.

make rings by linking their
tails, apparently in friendship.

with its two tails. It rarely uses
